text: Melinda Nagy (born 4 February 2000) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a defender and has appeared for the Romania women's national team. ==Career== Nagy has been capped for the Romania national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian women's footballers Category:Romania women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders Category:FCU Olimpia Cluj players
title: Melinda Nagy
